 2020-02632020-04-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Prohibition of Entry into Canada from the United States)
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (PROHIBITION OF ENTRY INTO CANADA FROM THE UNITED STATES) in order to support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by extending the prohibition of entry into Canada by foreign nationals from the United States, and by addressing the application of the Safe Third Country Agreement.
